about_the_game:
Claustrophobic Crypt: A 3D Maze Adventure

Beneath the surface of these mazes lies a deeper enigma—a journey through the neural pathways of the mind. Each corridor represents a connection in the human brain, much like your own thoughts and memories. This isn't just a game; it's an exploration of the intricate dance of neural activity. By navigating these mazes, you not only challenge your cognitive functions but also potentially create new neuronal pathways, enhancing your problem-solving skills in real life. The changing pathways in certain levels reflect the dynamic nature of neural connections, constantly shifting and adapting as you progress. Can you navigate the maze, uncover its secrets, and find your way out?

Step into the intriguing world of Claustrophobic Crypt, a single-player puzzle game that challenges your mind and reflexes. Developed by Dreadful Depths Studios, this game offers a unique blend of maze-solving, exploration, and light horror elements.

Game Features:

  • 3D Maze Exploration: Navigate through complex mazes in both first-person and third-person perspectives.

  • Mind-Bending Puzzles: Test your cognitive skills with challenging puzzles that engage your brain.

  • Stealth and Combat: Use weapons to fend off enemies or employ stealth to avoid them entirely.

content_descriptors.notes:
Claustrophobic Crypt may be disturbing to some players. It contains elements of intense horror, including encounters with frightening monsters, unsettling environments, and jump scares.
Use your discretion when purchasing this game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64 Bit
  • Processor: 12th Gen Intel Core i5-11400 or AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Super or AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 64 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 10 compatible
  • Additional Notes: As Claustrophobic Crypt receives updates and new content, system requirements might change. To ensure smooth gameplay, we recommend checking with your hardware manufacturer for compatibility information. Certain hardware components, like mobile chipsets, integrated graphics, and AGP graphics cards, may not be compatible. If your specifications aren't listed, it's best to confirm compatibility with your hardware manufacturer. Installation may require additional software. We'll provide a full list during the download process. We strive to keep this information up-to-date.

short_description: Map the labyrinth in your mind, your sanity and escape a derelict spaceship's terrifying maze in Claustrophobic Crypt, a single-player psychological horror adventure. Experience dread in stunning resolutions up to 4K and silky smooth 120 FPS gameplay.
